game_description: MAZE | ACTION | PUZZLE WARNING – READ REVIEWS - GAME LOOKS BETTER IN VR THAN IT SEEMS IN 2D, FULL VERSION AVAILABLE This game is a VR-evolution of classic 2D platform games with all of VR’s features, proudly made by Ayayu Games. If you love classic games and solving maze puzzles, this one’s for you! Shuttle Maze - VR Maze & Action Hybrid - Help Glow out from a bizarre space station controlled by a crazy AI - Blast & shoot enemy-bots - Use Dr. Harris's upgraded weapons - Race for best time - Immerse in pumping beats with carefully picked retro graphics - Motion sickness free gameplay Control spaceships in all 6 directions (Right, left, up, down, forward, and backwards) while moving freely around the large mazes! Help Glow, the renegade space racing pilot, to get her license back, by finding the famous genius AI-computer-scientist Dr. Harris It's just a simple in and out mission. NOTHING will go wrong...
Languages: English, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
review_1: Everyone must play this shuttle maze game
